это такой хоррор я испугался очень закричал и мама меня поругала и компьютер отобрала потом когда она мне комп отдала ну я просто пятерку получил по русскому я играл и там летать кто то начал я начал руками махать и ебнул рукой по монитору и мама увидела отхуярила меня скалкой и сказала что вернет компьютер в конце года короче всем советую крутая страшылка

This game is very unbalanced unless you grind to like level 40 in a certain character and get the perks needed to stand a chance. if you don't have coms with your team then it gets even harder. Any decent killer will wipe everyone in less than ten minutes. There are a lot of dlcs but they introduce even more broken killers. If you are playing with friends you have to reinvite them through  steam after every game. This game is pretty fun when you play with a whole team of friends but if you can't constantly have 2-4 people play with you then its un-fun. Another thing I dislike is the lack of communication with your team if you aren't friends, there is no chat or voice while in game. I guess if you can get it on sale for like $5 then it's worth it.
esperando o jogo ficar bom agr

Hra, která vás zabaví na dlouhé hodiny . Pokud si však hru kupujete jen kvůli killer hraní, tak byste měli vědět, že nováčci (20 rank) naprosto běžně hrají se 4 pokročilejšími přeživšími s vyššími ranky o 4-6, takže hry jsou dost nevyvážené a pro nové lidi často frustrující.
It's a very good and fun game it's just that these ranking errors keep happening lately after almost every match and i can't see what i get and it just drops me into the loading screen -_-

An sich ist es ein tolles Spiel... Aber die Community ist nur toxischer widerlicher Abfall... Tut mir leid dies so auszudrücken, aber anders kann ich es nicht beschreiben. Trotzdem muss ich dieses Spiel positiv bewerten, da es für die Community nichts kann.



Update 2 Jahre später:
Das Spiel hat sich in eine interessante Richtung entwickelt, leider scheint es BHVR an Personal für die Qualitätssicherung zu mangeln. Mit jedem neuen Patch werden Bugs gefixed, aber es entstehen immer wieder neue und das meistens an stellen die vorher Bugfrei waren. Die Community ist weniger toxisch geworden, allerdings gibt es leider auch in den hohen Rängen viele Camper, denn durch das neue Ranking System werden nur noch die Anzahl an Kills gemessen, wodurch Camper es leichter haben aufzusteigen. Aber im Grunde ist es immer noch ein spaßiges Spiel, das man immer wieder gerne anpackt.
very cool game very fun and does not make me angry so i get banned
El juego es buenisimo, lo único malo serían un par de Bugs que presenta el juego tanto es superviviente como en Asesino.

So I love this game and play it with friends almost every night.  I only have one complaint - customer service!!!  Every since the game updated I have been getting a "Rank Update Error" at the end of every game (only when I get a "pip" point - which never lets me go up in rank).  I have submitted a ticket but no return information to help me fix the problem.  My system is what they recommend, I've validated all files and lastly, uninstalled and reinstalled the game and I still get the same errors.   So, if you don't mind going up in rank and having the game restart every time you finish a run, then this game is for you.

Эта игра подойдет большинству, если не всем. Любители кооперативов смогут с головой погрузиться в совместную игру, титаны одиночества найдут себе развлечение в виде убийства сурвов или игры в прятки против мана, а любой другой игрок сможет насладиться разнообразием игровых механик. Огромное количество уникальных навыков, наличие предметов и подношений позволяют вам выстраивать свой собственный стиль геймплея, который будет работать.Хотя впрочем-то игра на данный момент хуйня, но мне нравится :)

This game is fun!

Игру подарил друг, дабы ему было не скучно играть самому. Игра понравилась буквально сразу, для меня таков жанр в новинку (не припомню подобных игр, да и я обходил их стороной), да, она с косяками и дизбалансом, но разработчики ее старательно поправляют. Непередаваемое ощущение, когда за тобой гонится маньяк, ломает тебя полностью, и по непонятное причине уходит, а тебя оставляет помирать, а ты уползаешь так далеко, что он тебя не находит и ты еще выбираешься и выигрываешь, проползя всю карту. Или когда ты чинишь генератор и начинает играть музыка и тут ты понимаешь, тебе хана, ну или когда маньяк попадается не опытный, то его можно разбайтить на кучу очей и поглумится над ним. А геймплей за убийц просто выше всех похвал. Вообщем смешных и забавный моментов в игре уйма.
Моя оценка игры: 9.3/10
Геймплей 9/10
Управление 8/10
Мультиплеер 10/10
Графика 9/10
Звук и Музыка 10/10
Локализация 10/10

O jogo é muito bom, no começo ele dá um pouco de medo, porém  com o tempo você se acostuma, ele tem um problema no long hit dos killers, depois de você ter pulado a janela e ter dado alguns passos ele te acertar.                                                                                                                         
         O Dead by Daylight é um jogo que você tem que muita paciência pra jogar, porque não é da noite pro dia que você vai jogar bem, uma dica que eu dou pra quem ta começando  é pra mudar o botão de fazer skill check, muda o espaço pro F, no meu caso ficou muito mais facil de acertar.                                                                                                              
    Outra coisa que é importante é jogar sem a habilidade Auto cura da Claudette, pode parecer interessante se curar sem kit médico ou sem a ajuda de outro sobrevivente, mas isso acaba atrasando muito a partida,o ideal mesmo é levar kit médico ou procurar algum sobrevivente pra te curar. Sempre foque em fazer os geradores principalmente se o killer estiver usando a perk Açougueiro desleixado, que penaliza em 20% as curas.                                                          
  Apesar de alguns problemas o jogo vale muito a pena, as gameplays  são bem variadas com mapas e killers diferentes.

I bought this because a friend really wanted me to play it with him. It took awhile getting used to it and actually wanting to play it but once I got the hang of it I loved it. Its a great game but it still needs some work. The game has LOTS of bad lag issues when connecting to other people no matter how good your internet is, the killer could be ten feet away from you and it still counts as a hit which is why I don't play this that much anymore.





Its a good game though, especially when you get five friends and one is killer and the other 4 are survivors.

El juego esta hecho para gente sin skills,con el gen rush no hace falta tener ninguna habilidad,da igual si sabes jugar,si tenes 2000hs o 100hs,si sos killer simplemente hay partidas que terminan en menos de 5 minutos por el gen rush,los devs no areglan el juego solo sacan mas ropita,no sacan los infinitos,no hay ninguna intencion de arreglar el juego encima nerfean la ruina, lo cual es muy ilogico ya que fomenta a que las partidas terminen mas rapido,como asesino es muy injusto jugar actualmente,en mapas como desguace hay demaciados pallets y el survivor simplemente tiene que tirarlos y ganar tiempo sin ninguna necesidad de ser bueno en el juego.Ni hablar de las premades que si saben jugar te van a volver loco en la partida y si no fuera poco se rien del asesino (no todos son asi).
Ademas al principio del juego te dan solo una parte de los supervivientes y asesinos,si queres los otros personajes tendras que comprarlos,ademas,los servidores dedicados en cuanto a ping van excellentes,pero tienen un fallo de hitbox muy notorio,lo cual malogra la jugabilidad del juego que es poder loopear,eso es lo mas divertido del juego y cada vez se nota mas que los devs no tienen intencion de fomentar que las personas aprendan a jugar,solo les interesa el dinero.

这几天才想起来给这个游戏评测，简单说就是黑暗版的老鹰捉小鸡+捉迷藏。对新手来说就是随便跑随便撞，躲到哪是哪，看到发电机就修，我是一个不喜欢看攻略的，地图全靠自己摸索，当我把几个场景的地图 发电机与地窖开启范围地点背下来的时候 ，游戏就真的单纯变成了捉迷藏 。 其实自己玩也没什么团队协作的感觉，= = 但画面做的确实好， 场景音效让人紧张的很有带入感 ，好像真的有什么人要来杀你似的 。再加上有时候玩它还要挂VPN 挂了也不稳定 所以真的是太难为我这个电脑小白，总体游戏还是非常不错的，就是需要一起玩的朋友，如果几个朋友一起玩会特别欢乐的。

This game is fun for the first 30-40 hours maybe. Then it is simply a nightmare. It is a casual horrorish meaningless game. 

The community is toxic. You will probably have heard it before, let me be frank: THE COMMUNITY IS UNBEARABLY TOXIC. I am talking about in-game behaviour, not just the insults and curses after the matches. People (co-op or killers) are constantly trying to spoil the fun in every possible way. The result is 1 out of 10 matches to be entertaining and then you realise that you spent precious time cursing and swearing instead of having fun. 

Do not buy this game. I uninstalled it a week ago and I was like "why did I spend so much time playing this shit?"

Not worth the buy as it is now. It's been going downhill for awhile. The development team would rather give you new skins versus fixing their broken game. Killers are unbalanced, community can be very helpful or toxic. There are no negatives to having a full blown survive with friends team. Things are honestly taking way to long to be fixed. I would wait about 6 months if not a year to purchase this game.

Edit: Dont purchase a broken game

How to break this down clearly so I can be fair to what is both good and bad in Dead by Daylight?.  

The game itself?  Fun when no one is cheating or being toxic (more on that later).  The concept is good, the execution is clean, they seem to have put a decent effort in to balancing the game play itself.  While the game play seems tight, the maps are not.  They need to bring someone in who is good at balancing the maps so there are less 5 minutes loops on some of the maps.

The Match Making system?  Inferior at best; 5-20 minutes to get a match as the killer, and survivors are so used to getting matches quickly you can end up with a room shuffle as they all abandon the room after waiting 30 seconds for 1 last survivor.  They say dedicated servers will help, to me it says more of a survivor/killer imbalance.  I may amend this portion of the review if they ever clean this up.

The last part is the culture of the game itself.  Very toxic.  Very.  So much so to the point of being ridiculous.  You will get face camped by killers who are sick of survivors tea bagging and overall being fools, or maybe they are just a bully themselves.  You will get tea bagged by immature toxic survivors who, I cannot prove they were cheating, but man I never seem to be able to catch them, even being faster than they are ..... and they are running a straight line .... The burden of proof requirement is difficult.  You have to remember the name and the skin of the person who was cheating/being a poor sport, then attach video proof.  I also hope this will improve with the data being server side once dedicated servers hit.

In its current form I cannot recommend this game as a whole.  Until the developers take a good look at the toxic bully culture they are either encouraging or alternatively not taking seriously and clean up the cheating, this game is not yet whole.  If you do buy it, remember to have thick skin.  Cheaters and toxic people thrive on tears.
